refnamediv.refpurpose: General function for modification of multi_contact_frame objects.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: gf_multi_contact_frame_set(multi_contact_frame MCF, 'add slave boundary', mesh_im mim, int region, string varname [, string multname [, string wname]])
gf_multi_contact_frame_set(multi_contact_frame MCF, 'add master boundary', mesh_im mim, int region, string varname [, string multname [, string wname]])

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: General function for modification of multi_contact_frame objects.

listitem.para: Add a rigid obstacle. The string obs is the expression of a function which should be closed to a signed distance to the obstacle.

para.literal: gf_multi_contact_frame_set(multi_contact_frame MCF, 'add slave boundary', mesh_im mim, int region, string varname [, string multname [, string wname]])
gf_multi_contact_frame_set(multi_contact_frame MCF, 'add master boundary', mesh_im mim, int region, string varname [, string multname [, string wname]])
